resources.string: The teacher is viewing your video
The teacher has closed all rooms
Copy classroom content to breakout rooms
You can invite the teacher to this group for assistance.
The teacher is currently helping others. Please try again later.
Teacher is inviting you to join %s
The teacher is inviting you to return to main room
The teacher is already in this group.
The teacher is helping other groups. Please try again later.
After closing all breakout rooms, all the students will be returned to the main room.
Do you want to close all breakout rooms?
The image file is too large to load. Please choose another one.
The account was logged in on another device
You are muted by the teacher
There is no announcement for now. Go to publish it
Failed to gain access to the album
You have been muted by the teacher
Failed to send the message, as it contains sensitive words.
The teacher muted all the students.
The teacher unmuted all the students.
You are logged in on another device
You are disconnected from the internet. Please check your network connection.
Unstable network connection. Please check your local network connection.
You can now annotate on the whiteboard.
Your access to the whiteboard has been revoked by the teacher.
Do you want to start recording？
Do you want to stop recording？
This session will end in %s minutes
Do you want to end this session?
The class will be over in %s minutes.
Class is not end, Are you sure you want to quit the classroom?
Congratulations to %s students, including %s, for receiving awards.
Congratulations to %s for receiving the award.
You have been muted in the chat.
Allow flexible classroom to access your Photos in "Setting"->"Privacy"->"Photos"
Drag one finger on the touch screen to capture a screenshot
Drag the left click button on your mouse to screenshot an area
I have read and confirmed to delete my account
Are you sure to delete your account?

Unfortunately，Flexible Classroom is not able to continue serving you.Thank you.
 Delete your account will result in ….
 1.Delete the room data associated with the account
 2.delete account and mobile
The teacher has authorized you to control the screen
Student devices do not support remote control.
The teacher has forbidden your screen control
Can\'t share student\'s screen as there\'s no student in the classroom
%s has not agreed to share his/her screen yet. The system has reminded %s to click on the "Agree" button to share his/her screen.
The teacher has stopped viewing your screen
The teacher adds to have access to your screen content and remote control your device .Do you want to accept now?
You can assign a student to share the screen
If you have trouble accessing the remote control features, please turn off your anti-virus software
The number of video call windows has reached the upper limit of %s
The teacher has turned on your camera.
The teacher has turned off your camera.
You can raise hand to request the teacher to start video.
You can raise hand to request the teacher to unmute.
Raise your hand by holding this button.
Ban the student from re-entering the classroom
Remove the student from the classroom
You have been removed from the classroom.
You are on stage now,You are in presentation mode now. Please feel free to interact with others.
You are off the stage now.
The student has left the classroom
The teacher has left the classroom
Waiting for students to enter the classroom
Waiting for the teacher to enter the classroom
The teacher is not in the classroom
Are you sure to start lessons in advance and play videos
